forecast.name: Christmas Day
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 40, with temperatures falling to around 35 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 27. East northeast wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Freezing Rain then Rain And Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain between 7am and noon, then rain and snow. Cloudy, with a high near 34. East wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Rain And Snow then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow before 7pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. North northwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Christmas Day

forecast.name: Friday

Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Buck's Run still has complete coverage! But you'll have to walk a bit to get to it: the clubhouse is closed as is the clubhouse parking lot. Classic tracks are very hard pack or ice but still deep enough to stay on the track. The skating lane is hard pack but several people were skating without any trouble. Me? Klister. But my Rex "Oi" just wasn't working very well, probably because of the rushed job of waxing. Great day to doublepole!

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are fully open and in good condition with a classic track. Trails were packed on Tuesday.
nubsNob.comments:
Merry Christmas from all of us at Nub's Nob. We are open from 11:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. today.
Pintail Peak Lodge is also open. Santa will be skiing on Big Time today. Everything is groomed and in great condition to enjoy Christmas on the slopes. Make it a great Christmas Day at Nub's Nob.
